title: My Art Journey
script:
Anushka: Namaste doston! Aaj main aap sabse apni kala yatra ke bare mein baat karna chahti hoon.
Anushka: Ye safar, sach mein, kahaniyon se bhara hua hai.
Anushka: Bachpan mein, mujhe rangon se khelna bahut pasand tha. Diwaron par, kitabon par... jahan bhi jagah milti, main kuch na kuch bana deti thi.
Anushka: Maa daanti thi, par papa hamesha support karte the. Unhone hi mujhe pehli drawing book di thi.
Anushka: Phir school mein art classes shuru hui. Main hamesha excited rehti thi, lekin perfect banane ka pressure bhi tha.
Anushka: Ek baar, maine ek painting banai, lekin mujhe woh bilkul pasand nahi aayi. Maine use phaad diya.
Anushka: Tab mere art teacher ne mujhe samjhaya ki kala mein galatiyan bhi seekhne ka hissa hoti hain.
Anushka: Unhone kaha, "Anushka, perfect banne ki koshish mat karo. Bas dil se banao."
Anushka: Us din se, maine fearlessly paint karna shuru kar diya. Experiments kiye, different mediums try kiye.
Anushka: Ab main professionally paintings banati hoon. Log mere kaam ko pasand karte hain, yeh dekhkar mujhe bahut khushi hoti hai.
Anushka: Lekin sach yeh hai ki success sirf ek hissa hai. Main kala ko apne aap ko express karne ka zariya manti hoon.
Anushka: Aur sabse important baat, main ab bhi seekh rahi hoon. Har din ek naya challenge hai, ek naya mauka hai kuch banane ka.
Anushka: Meri art journey abhi bhi jaari hai, aur main excited hoon ki yeh mujhe kahaan lekar jayegi. Dhanyavaad!
